content.body: Sorry, yes, Chrome's behaviour for non-special URLs is currently incorrect, but we're working on it. You can star this bug https://issues.chromium.org/issues/40063064 to be notified when there are updates.

When trying to build the HTML spec in my macOS (Sonoma 14.4.1) environment, I was getting the following error:
>   = note: ld: library 'System' not found
>          clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)

To fix it I needed to do this:

> export LIBRARY_PATH="$LIBRARY_PATH:/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/lib"

I wonder if we should document this
content.formatted_body:
When trying to build the HTML spec in my macOS (Sonoma 14.4.1) environment, I was getting the following error:

= note: ld: library 'System' not found
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)

To fix it I needed to do this:

export LIBRARY_PATH="$LIBRARY_PATH:/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/lib"

I wonder if we should document this
